info.name: Pet Makeover
info.description: Changes colour of your pet and/or swap its images with the ones provided.
info.additionalInfo: UPDATE 02.04.2015: - Added adult version of Atsui - Added link to Irina's tumblr in describtion where you can find nice pets variations :D - If you created your own pet and would like to share it, write to me in ELdarya(link below) :D Simple tool for changing your pet image with any image you want. Now you can enjoy having unicorns and alikes instead of usual pets. Created with Driada's help. Really nice designs by Irina! The main image is 450x450px(although it may vary due to screen resolution). The header is 73x73px. Hue change affects the colour of the pet. For reference look here. 0 is default colour. Also, you can use image database , where you'll find original pet images. It changes the look for you and you only and does not change any game aspect. If you like it feel free to add me here. I'm talkative and would love to hear various opinions not only about the game :D
